author: dr.christian.unger
title: The Cardano Carbon Footprint
description: We want to make Cardano carbon neutral and climate positive. If we know Cardano's carbon footprint, we can make the shift to positive.
solution: A Cardano greenhouse gas accounting standard verified by independent specialists, the Cardano Foundation, SPOs and delegators.
experience: We are climate scientists, environmental and computer engineers who run several stake pools and help organise CarbonNeutralCardano.org
